titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on riboflavin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/2/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1997, the duty on 6,7 Dimethyl-9-(D, 1-Ribeytl)-iso-allazine (riboflavin).
